body.name: Amazon Essentials Men's Full-Zip Hooded Fleece Sweatshirt (Available in Big & Tall)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Fabric type Body: 56% Cotton, 44% Polyester; Hood Lining: 60% Cotton, 40% Polyester
REGULAR FIT: Comfortable, easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist
BRUSHED FLEECE: 8.3 oz soft brushed-back cotton-polyester blend fleece for staying cozy and keeping warm.
HOODED SWEATSHIRT: A classic everyday essential, this hooded sweatshirt is casual and comfortable. Throw it on for running errands or layer it with a collared shirt for a more dressed up look.
DETAILS: Features three panel lined hood with metal grommets and adjustable drawcord, full length center front zipper, and hand pockets. Athletic rib trim at sleeve and bottom hem.
body.description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of men's must-haves includes polo shirts, chino pants, classic-fit shorts, casual button-downs, and crew-neck tees. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit, comfy, soft, and warm!
reviews.reviewText: This hoodie was thicker than I expected, super soft, and very warm! It fits great and feels well-made. Great for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Essentials Hooded Fleece: Cozy, Stylish, Perfect Fit!
reviews.reviewText: Amazon Essentials Men's Full-Zip Hooded Fleece Sweatshirt (Available in Big & Tall) is a must-have for anyone seeking comfort, style, and the perfect fit. This cozy fleece sweatshirt not only keeps you warm but also adds a touch of casual sophistication to your wardrobe. The full-zip design offers versatility, and the availability in Big & Tall sizes ensures that everyone can enjoy a comfortable and stylish fit. Whether you're running errands or just relaxing at home, this sweatshirt is an essential addition to your collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent hoodie - runs a little small!
reviews.reviewText: I like this hoodie, it is definitely great quality, bright color- and feels good. It does a little small I’d say. Got it for such a good price to!Will definitely buy it again, especially if it goes on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warmer than expected, cozy jacket
reviews.reviewText: This was listed at a super low price and I love stripes (and hoodies), so I grabbed it. I'm a medium in womens, so I ordered a small (it's mens) and it fits nicely. Very warm, not super flattering because it's cut for a man's body, but comfy to lounge in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Knows True Fashion
reviews.reviewText: I'm satisfied with the hoodie. I also bought a zip up Fleece Vest in the same exact:"Buffalo Plaid" pattern (aka checkerboard, or Americanized Scottish) and they both fit perfectly and are durable, and comfortable and easy to clean and keeps me warm. I would but again, definitely, if I had too, but I trust it'll last a long time. They actually did a great job on the quality of craftsmanship with the Amazon Essentials hoodie and vest. I'd buy a matching hat and pants to go with these in Amazon Essentials brand, as well, if it's available. It's a popular pattern, especially in December and January, but, at least I know "Buffalo Plaid" is more of a Scottish thing, than people realize. Which is appropriate, as that runs in the family. I just see everyone wearing it these days and shake my head about it. But pattern aside, the importance of this review, is to justify that Amazon Essentials is excellent high quality craftsmanship in their personal brand of clothing line. I ONLY give credit like this if it's earned and worth mentioning. And they make great winter weather clothes, apparently, as I'm a satisfied customer with purchases like the hoodie and vest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Jacket but didn't fit woman right
reviews.reviewText: This is really a beautiful jacket but it didn't work for me as a woman. I wanted a regular, not oversized fit, so I bought a Small. I would normally buy a Medium in women's tops and bottoms. It's snug around the hips (I am not particularly hippy and don't have much of a belly). I can zip it and it looks fine but it feels tight. The sleeves are too long for me so there are a lot of folds/bumps. If I sized up for the hips , the rest of the jacket and especially the sleeves would be too big. So I am returning it. I also was looking for a lightweight sweatshirt jacket. This one I would call medium weight - not really thick and bulky like some, but it does have some cush to it. It's really soft and snuggly and if it fit me better, I'd keep it even though it's a little heavier than I wanted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the price. Soft and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I did not expect much. I expected slightly scratchy, and a little thin for the price. But I was nicely surprised. The material is soft, comfortable and it is well made... and warm. Zipper is durable, works well, and holds up to washing. If there is one complaint, it was that the cuffs are a little loose, but if my arms and hards were bigger, then I might have appreciated that. Definitely as good as any named brand product of this type at a fraction of the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Essentials experience- amazon.com
reviews.reviewText: This Amazon brand is not quality by anymeans. I got some Sweatpants and Zipper Hoodies. I wrote a review about the sweatpants my feeling is they are bit Off the size and fit just feel a lil weird but I kept them. Now the Sweatshirts... I bought 7 and they shipped in 3 separate shipments on 3 consecutive days... 2 then 4 then 1- Very wasteful. Job security for the delivery people I guess. lol. So I try on the first 2 that arrived. They were very snug I immediately packed them back up for return. I wear Hanes XL all winter fits very good comfortable fit I have an XXL Hanes that is big on me for when I wear heavy sweatshirts under it.So today I get the second shipment... set aside 2 XL for return. Try on The XXL and it was a better fit but still not near as comfortable as my Hanes. So now I inspected the actual garment and access the quality.... And the Zipper is plastic.... And the cuffs and waistband just are there. They don't taper or cinch properly. So the air can flow up around the waist. The wrists just float they don't fit to your wrist... I only bought the Amazon Essentials because sale price was 1/3 of original... Why not give it a try. I hate returning stuff. I was very disappointed horrible fit and quality is disappointing. The actual material is pretty light weight but seems ok. I just noticed though on the Amazon ones you can see the stitching on the outside... on the should wrists waist arms. Pockets I get you can't avoid it but my Hanes stitching is seen on the inside.You can buy if it is cheap on sale. I am keeping the XXL sweatshirts(really XL) but be aware you won't be 100% on the fit. I was like eehhhh for $8 I will try. I bought these hoping to regularly wear the XL around the house and the XXL over other warm clothing out in the cold weather. Now I will probably just wear the XXLs on occasion but not every day all day like my Hanes. The XLs are going back.Just an honest review. And disappointment .Now I have to stop by a Kohls for the easiest way for me to return because they give like 6 weeks to do it and do drive by a Kohls when I go to Walmart every couple weeks.

This is a thick fleece material. Its a deep maroon, not red on the one I ordered. I used this sweatshirt as the base to make my son a Ninjago hoodie. The material is thick, the cuffs are ribbed. The arm length is great, leaning towards the longer side. My favorite feature is the lined hoodie portion. It has a super soft jersey in the hood. This keeps your hair from getting static in it from the fleece. The whole jacket has a great length to it, its not short. and the band around the bottom is ribbed like the cuffs. The zipper is a heavy duty zipper that doesn't snag or catch. We have about 6 of these hoodie's. Great Hoodie for the money.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente compra, buen producto y tiempo de entrega
reviews.reviewText: Buena compra, diseño y material muy buena calidad, talla muy exactas considerar una talla mayor para una mejor comodidad.
So happy with the material and size , It's perfect

reviews.reviewTitle: Felpa in Pile con Cappuccio e Cerniera Intera
reviews.reviewText: Una felpa in pile con cappuccio e cerniera intera, capo d'abbigliamento comodo e versatile, particolarmente adatto per le giornate fresche o fredde.Materiale in pile: realizzate con un tessuto morbido e caldo chiamato "pile", costituito da poliestere o una miscela di materiali sintetici. Il pile è noto per la sua capacità di trattenere il calore corporeo, mantenendo il corpo al caldo durante le giornate fredde.Cappuccio: La presenza del cappuccio aggiunge un elemento di praticità e stile alla felpa. Il cappuccio può essere indossato per proteggere la testa e le orecchie dal freddo o dalla pioggia leggera, o semplicemente per uno stile casual e sportivo.Cerniera intera: La cerniera intera si estende lungo tutta la lunghezza della felpa, dalla parte inferiore fino alla parte superiore del cappuccio. Questo consente di aprire e chiudere facilmente la felpa per regolare la ventilazione e facilitare l'indossamento e lo spogliamento.Tasche laterali: dotata di tasche laterali.Maniche lunghe e polsini elastici: Le maniche lunghe e i polsini elastici contribuiscono a mantenere il calore corporeo all'interno della felpa, impedendo al freddo di entrare e mantenendo una vestibilità comoda e aderente.Facilità di manutenzione: facile da lavare e mantenere. Può essere lavata in lavatrice e asciugata in asciugatrice a basse temperature senza dover essere stirate.Colore come da foto.Consegna puntuale
Très bon produit Je viens d'en racheter un autre chaud et très agréable à porter
